Sentencas: An innovative polygeneration structure is proposed based on the oxyfuel power generation (OPG) system integration with carbon dioxide (CO2) capture, CO2 power system, NH3/H2O absorption refrigeration (AR) unit, and organic Rankine power (ORP) cycle.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: In this regard, a combination of solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) and solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is applied to produce the required pure oxygen for the OPG system.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: The proposed system simultaneously produces 7204 kmol/h hot water, 149.3 kmol/h liquid CO2, and 102.4 MW power in different cycles.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: Energy and exergy analyses are performed to evaluate the proposed system.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: The thermodynamic modeling and simulation of power and refrigeration cycles are performed in Aspen HYSYS software, and verified with high accuracy.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: Also, an integrated SOEC/SOFC simulation has been done using developed computer code in MATLAB programming.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: The overall electrical efficiency and the AR coefficient of performance are calculated at 31.55% and 0.4803, respectively.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: In addition, the thermal and exergy efficiencies of the proposed system are 65.10% and 70.60%, respectively.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: The exergy analysis indicates the combustion chamber's highest exergy destruction with a share of 35.26%.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: In the next rank, the heat exchangers (26.42%) and turbines (16.98%) have the largest share of degraded exergy among other devices.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: The sensitivity analysis demonstrates that when the oxygen productivity increases from 9050 to 9275 kg/h, the electrical efficiency in the total integrated structure and the liquid CO2 productivity rise to 34.57% and 6480 kg/h, respectively.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle

Sentencas: Also, by increasing the natural gas entering the proposed structure from 2375 to 2550 kg/h, the exergy efficiency of the structure increases to 71.19% and its thermal efficiency decreases to 58.70%.
Titulo: An innovative hybrid system for the polygeneration of power, heat, and liquid carbon dioxide using solid oxide fuel cell/electrolyzer technology and oxyfuel power generation cycle
